translation.en: -[guitar riff plays] -What up? This is gonna be sick.
Sam, are you ready to get hurt?
translation.zh: ‎阿珊 你准备好受伤了吗？
‎当然 生出来就准备好了

translation.en: Sammy's gonna ring the doorbell of her ex-boyfriend,
translation.zh: ‎珊珊要按响前男友家的门铃

translation.en: even though she knows his new girlfriend lives there right now.
translation.zh: ‎哪怕她知道前男友正在跟新女友同居

translation.en: Hey. What are you doing here?
[energetically] I am still single, and last week,
I made a fake Instagram account to stalk your girlfriend,
translation.zh:
‎我开了一个假的Instagram账户
‎偷偷关注你的女朋友

translation.en: [yelling] Oh, my God! That hurt my heart so bad!
translation.zh: ‎天哪 这种话伤得我的心好痛

translation.en: Let's see that again in slow-mo. [laughs]
You're gonna find someone. You're gonna be good, and you know what?
translation.zh: ‎你…你会找到心上人的 ‎你会看开的 你知道吗？

translation.en: -[whimsical music plays] -[female host] Meet the Shlesingers.
Seemingly normal newlyweds on the outside,
translation.zh: ‎表面上看是普通的新婚夫妇

translation.en: once you step inside their home.
No. She is not like other wives.
translation.zh: ‎不 她跟其他妻子不一样

translation.en: When we first started dating, she was this...
translation.zh: ‎我们第一次约会的时候 她是这样的…

translation.en: it's like she's my bro, and my wife.
Let's get you jerked off so you're not horny at dinner.
translation.zh:
‎现在就让你射出来
‎免得你在晚饭时那么色 快点

translation.en: [female host] From their unconventional marriage dynamic...
-Whoa! Put your butt away! -[whimsical music fades]
No one's trying to see that.

translation.zh: ‎…到他们意想不到的睡觉挑战

translation.en: Sharing a bed with her is a whole thing.
translation.zh: ‎跟她同床是一件很艰难的事情

translation.en: This big. Do you see that?
That's the size of a full-grown bass.
[host] See how they attempt to navigate life...
translation.zh: ‎在一个回避他们生活方式的社会

translation.en: -And you have a chicken. -[lighthearted music fades]
Why not stick one in and see how you like it?
translation.zh: ‎为什么不插一个 看你是否喜欢呢？

translation.en: -[dance music plays] -I'm Ellen Plebles, and this is week two
translation.zh: ‎我是艾伦·普莱博 ‎这是健美胖兄弟项目的第二周

translation.en: of the Ripped Fat Dudes workout.
translation.zh: ‎这是健美胖兄弟项目的第二周
‎这是一个我设计的四周项目

translation.en: to keep you in the best shape you can be
as an adult male who eats peanut butter sandwiches in between meals.
translation.zh:
‎吃花生酱三明治的成年男性
‎保持最佳身材

translation.en: Let's meet some of our trainers.
He's my advanced Ripped Fat Dude.
They're almost a full A cup.
Joe, tell everyone how you maintain that Ripped Fat Dude shape.
translation.zh:
‎乔 告诉大家你怎么保持
‎健美胖兄弟体型的

translation.en: Well, I used to play baseball, I ate waffles
translation.zh: ‎我之前打棒球 吃华夫饼

translation.en: -three to four times a day. -Nice, Joe.
-[hands clap] -Now let's blast through five grown-man push-ups slowly. Hit it.
translation.zh:
‎现在让我们慢慢做
‎五个成人俯卧撑 开始

translation.en: -[exhales] -I want you to notice Joe's form.
See how he keeps it wide.
That way, he's guaranteed to get a jacked armpit, covered in stretch marks.
translation.zh:
‎这样做 他可以保证撑开腋窝
‎覆盖肥胖纹

translation.en: This is the perfect workout to do
at your niece's christening or in the parking lot of any Best Buy.
translation.zh:
‎在你侄女受洗
‎或随便哪个百思买停车场都能做

translation.en: And when you're done, make sure to chug down
one to two full-calorie Monster Energy drinks.
translation.zh: ‎一到两瓶富含卡路里的魔爪能量饮料

translation.en: I always like to incorporate -[weight clatters] -an excruciatingly slow bicep curl
translation.zh:
‎每次锻炼
‎我都喜欢加入一组难以忍受的

translation.en: into every workout I do. Why?
translation.zh: ‎缓慢二头肌弯举 为什么？

translation.en: Because it does not burn any calories.
translation.zh: ‎因为这样做不会燃烧任何卡路里

translation.en: That way, you can get a ripped shoulder
translation.zh: ‎这么做 你会得到健美的肩部

translation.en: with a generous layer of fat covering it.
And that's how we're going to maintain that Ripped Fat Dude Physique.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们保持
‎健美胖兄弟体型的方法

translation.en: Remember, the Ripped Fat Dude workout plan is all about adding bulk
translation.zh: ‎记住 健美胖兄弟锻炼计划 ‎就是增大身躯

translation.en: You wanna look like a potato that's been squeezed by thumbs.
translation.zh: ‎你想看起来像一个被手指捏过的土豆

translation.en: We're talking Matt Damon in between movies,
translation.zh: ‎我们说的是拍电影间隙的马特·达蒙

translation.en: or Russell Crowe at his absolute peak.
translation.zh: ‎或是处于职业生涯巅峰的罗素·克劳

translation.en: I'll see you Ripped Fat Dudes around.
translation.zh:
‎期待看到
‎你们这些健美胖兄弟闲逛

translation.en: And by around, I mean hanging out doing nothing
translation.zh: ‎闲逛 我是说在南波士顿

translation.en: on the perimeter of every MMA gym in South Boston.
translation.zh:
‎每间综合格斗场馆里漫步
‎什么也不做

translation.en: We're here at Rick's Snake Farm. Shit's about to get real messed up
translation.zh:
‎我们正在瑞克的蛇园
‎情况马上会变得一团糟

translation.en: -because I brought my friend, Liz... -Hi. ...who wasn't invited
translation.zh:
‎因为我带来了我的朋友莉兹
‎其实没人请她来

translation.en: because she and Sammy are kind of on the outs right now,
translation.zh: ‎因为现在她和珊珊有点矛盾

translation.en: since Liz dropped out last minute to Sammy's 35th in Palm Springs,
translation.zh:
‎原因莉兹最后决定不参加珊珊
‎在棕榈泉举办的35岁生日派对

translation.en: but I'm pretty sure Liz still paid for the room.
translation.zh: ‎但我十分确定莉兹依然付了房费

translation.en: -I did. -So Sammy has no reason to still be upset.
translation.zh: ‎所以珊珊没有继续伤心的理由了

translation.en: Either way, I did not text Sammy to let her know Liz was coming.
translation.zh:
‎不管怎么样 我没有发信息给珊珊
‎告诉她莉兹要来

translation.en: and we're at Rick's Snake Pit.
-We're gonna go get some snakes-- -Hey, Sammy!
translation.zh:
‎-我们要抓几条蛇
‎-嘿 珊珊

translation.en: -The show at my expense! -[Iliza] What's wrong with you?
translation.zh:
‎-这个节目是我出的钱
‎-你有什么毛病？

translation.en: What do you mean what's wrong with me?
-This is my show! -I get it, I get it!
-[Iliza] She is a bitch-- -But whatever, she's our friend--
translation.zh:
‎-她是婊子
‎-但不管怎样 她是我们的朋友…

translation.en: You guys, I'm standing, like, three feet away!
translation.zh: ‎喂 我站这里全都听得见

translation.en: [friend] It was a sick-ass stunt that hurt everyone involved, even me.
translation.zh:
‎这是一个恶心的噱头
‎伤害了所有人 包括我

translation.en: Stef's gonna tell me that everyone thinks I'm kind of a bitch. [sighs]
translation.zh:
‎史黛芬会告诉我
‎大家都觉得我算是个婊子

translation.en: But the truth is, if they just took a second to get to know me,
translation.zh: ‎但真相是如果她们花一秒钟了解我

translation.en: they'd see that I'm actually really shy.
translation.zh: ‎她们会发现实际上我是真的害羞

translation.en: ♪ Which one is smaller? Your lips or your feet? ♪
translation.zh:
‎哪一个更小一点？
‎你的嘴唇还是脚

translation.en: [male narrator] She was the greatest star in the world.
translation.zh: ‎她曾经是世界上最伟大的明星

translation.en: [narrator] One of the greatest songwriters in history.
♪ You are so tiny ♪ ♪ You've got a chubby little body ♪
translation.zh: ‎你真是渺小 你有一个胖胖的小身体

translation.en: ♪ And you've got a stinky fish mouth ♪

translation.zh: ‎你的专辑获得三白金的销量

translation.en: You're the only artist to perform alongside her own hologram.
translation.zh:
‎你是唯一一个
‎和自己的全息影像一起表演的艺术家

translation.en: Tell me, how did this all start?
translation.zh: ‎告诉我 这一切是如何开始的？

translation.en: It was a long time ago...
[Iliza] ♪ I frame your nose with my hand ♪
♪ Let's not pretend You're not made of meat ♪
♪ Your body is made of meat ♪
♪ And your lips are made of beef ♪
♪ You do it With your neck beard ♪
translation.zh: ‎你去做 用你脖子上的毛

translation.en: ♪ And shake it With your neck beard ♪
translation.zh: ‎你去摇 用你脖子上的毛

translation.en: I think you've got what it takes.
I'm just a waitress who sings...
There's someone I'd like you to meet.
Oh, hi. You think you could, uh... do one for him?
translation.zh:
‎-哦 你好
‎-你觉得你能为他唱一首吗？

translation.en: And all the dogs were there. I mean, the dogs are always there, but I was...
translation.zh:
‎所有的狗狗都会到场
‎我是说狗狗每场都会在 但我…

translation.en: She's with a fan right now.
-[crowd cheering] -We love you! We love you!
translation.zh: ‎我们爱你们 我们爱你们

translation.en: [yelling] I don't know who you are anymore!
♪ Cat feet, high in the sky ♪
You gotta get back out there, kid.
who need to hear the nonsense you sing.
translation.zh: ‎需要听你唱那些乱七八糟的歌

translation.en: If I'm a tiny dog, then you're...
translation.zh: ‎如果我是一条小狗 那么你是…

translation.en: [narrator] The inspiring story of one of the most iconic voices in music.
translation.zh: ‎音乐行业最具标志性歌手的励志故事

translation.en: Why does she need a band?
[male narrator] The world is a dangerous place.
to gun violence and more, -[people screaming] -tragedy could strike -[explodes] -any time.
translation.zh:
‎到枪支暴力等等
‎悲剧随时可能发生

translation.en: It's important to stay informed, so you can stay safe.
translation.zh:
‎保证消息灵通很重要
‎这样才能保证你的安全

translation.en: What if there was an app that warned you about emergencies...
translation.zh:
‎如果有一款应用程序
‎可以发送最新的通知

translation.en: ...with up-to-the-minute notifications to keep you out of harm's way?
translation.zh:
‎提醒你发生紧急状况
‎让你远离危险 那会怎么样呢？

translation.en: Breaking news on the biggest threats
from a team of moms with their fingers on the pulse.
translation.zh: ‎向大家发送最严重威胁的突发新闻

translation.en: I can get back to my journaling now.

translation.zh: ‎“意大利沙门氏菌爆发 不干净的虾”

translation.en: [narrator] Just plug in your location to start getting updates about emergencies
translation.zh:
‎只要设置好你的位置
‎开始接受全世界

translation.en: within the radius of the entire Earth.
You can even customize your preferences by type of tragedy,
translation.zh: ‎你甚至可以定制悲剧类型的喜好

translation.en: -[alarm beeps] -and then continue to receive alerts
about all of them, no matter what you pick.
I was all set to go on my honeymoon in Italy.
translation.zh: ‎我本来都准备好去意大利度蜜月了

translation.en: Then Mom Alerts told me about my cousin
being robbed in Toronto one time.
translation.zh: ‎我侄子有一次在多伦多被抢劫

translation.en: I travel a lot for work.
On a recent trip to Colorado,
Mom Alerts reminded me about JonBenét Ramsey.
translation.zh:
‎妈妈警报提醒我
‎琼贝妮特·拉姆齐谋杀案

translation.en: If it wasn't for Mom Alerts,
I wouldn't know about my mom's friend Jody's son,
translation.zh: ‎我不会了解我的朋友乔迪的儿子

translation.en: the one who went to Tups.
[narrator] Our moms are working around the clock, ready whenever,
translation.zh: ‎我们的妈妈们夜以继日地工作 ‎随时随地准备好 只要消息曝光

translation.en: wherever, to send you instant alerts
translation.zh: ‎随时随地准备好 只要消息曝光

translation.en: as soon as the news breaks,
and delayed warnings that come several years later
about something they kind of remember.
Life-or-death news alerts the way you want them,
translation.zh:
‎生死攸关的新闻警报
‎你想要的接收方式

translation.en: sandwiched between cryptic, mundane updates about other things.
translation.zh:
‎在警报之间 应用还会发送
‎一些神秘的平凡琐事

translation.en: And sign up for Mom Alert Premium
to hear audio warnings with even more detail.
translation.zh: ‎可以收听细节更多的语音警报

translation.en: [woman] Valeria said it has a bad battery.
translation.zh: ‎瓦莱里娅说它的电池很糟糕
‎或是其他事 我不记得了

translation.en: And it exploded in someone's mouth.
Anyway, just calling to make sure that you don't have that toothbrush.
translation.zh:
‎不管怎样
‎打电话确认你没有那种牙刷
‎一天两次 没有其他信息

translation.en: I mean, goes without saying, and yet here I am saying it,
translation.zh: ‎我的意思是 不用说 但我还是要说

translation.en: we are so pleased with how this campaign is being received.
translation.zh:
‎我们对于这次宣传活动的反馈
‎感到非常满意

translation.en: Right? Bridget, do you care to walk us through some of the roll-out details?
translation.zh:
‎对吗？布丽吉特 你能介绍一下
‎新产品推出的细节吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] So, we launched last month across digital,

translation.zh:
‎传统领域 流媒体
‎甚至纸质媒体上投放了广告

translation.en: -[woman] Ooh! -[Bridget laughs] It was a bold strategy, but the numbers are really paying off.
translation.zh:
‎这是一个大胆的战略
‎但这些投入确实带来了回报

‎-真的是让人兴奋的产品
‎-我拿一个

translation.en: -[Bridget] I'll take it. -That is really exciting stuff.
translation.zh:
‎-真的是让人兴奋的产品
‎-我拿一个 ‎那真是令人兴奋的产品

translation.en: Now, who we're dealing with here,
you know, they're a high premium brand.
And so, success here... [crunches into nectarine]
[muffled] It means that... that we can work
with those kinds of high caliber brands.
That's exactly what I was thinking. If I could just jump in for a second.
translation.zh:
‎这真是我一直在考虑的
‎允许我打断一下
‎我们已经和马丁公司的头头

translation.en: with Martin's head, uh, you know,

translation.zh:
‎-进行了美妙的交谈
‎-哦 对

translation.en: And if we circle back next week,
I think we can close those deals.
And I would add Hodge to that list, too.
Hunter and I had a great conversation with them last month,
translation.zh:
‎上个月亨特和我
‎跟他们进行了非常棒的交流

translation.en: and I wanna circle back with them 'cause I think they're really ready
translation.zh:
‎我打算回头找他们聊聊
‎因为我认为他们真的准备好

translation.en: [muffled] Thank you, Sonia. I love to know that.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 索尼娅 知道这个消息我很高兴

translation.en: [muffled] Oh, this is gonna come as no surprise to all you guys, but...
translation.zh:
‎哦 你们对这个消息
‎都不会惊讶 但是…

translation.en: it all comes back to the creator.
I wonder if you wanna talk...
You know, from a content perspective, about...
-who I think totally got the product. -[group slurps and chews loudly]
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他们真正懂这个产品

translation.en: Were you able to connect with the client?
Not since last week, uh, but...
[muffled] I'm gonna see Kathy at the event on Tuesday.
translation.zh: ‎我会在周二的活动上见到凯茜

translation.en: I'm gonna circle around with her to see if they're still ready to engage.
translation.zh:
‎我会再跟她沟通
‎看他们是否准备好了参与

translation.en: -[woman] If I could just chime in here... -[chews loudly]
[muffled] This has no doubt been a success on so many levels, all right?
translation.zh:
‎毫无疑问 这件事在很多层面上
‎都是成功的 对吗？

translation.en: I think that we can do better in Q3.
translation.zh: ‎我想我们在23方面可以做得更好

translation.en: What we need to do is increase the money
for these types of projects specifically.
translation.zh: ‎是为这类型的项目专门增加资金

translation.en: it's possible that this deal pre-dates our new sales goals.
translation.zh:
‎这笔交易完成的时间
‎可能早于我们达到新销售目标

translation.en: -Or at least, -[nectarine thuds] will be made more explicit.
translation.zh:
‎或者至少
‎我们可以让它们更明确吗？

translation.en: [muffled] And we can go granular on that on the sales call on Friday.
translation.zh: ‎周五的销售电话上我们可以细化一下

translation.en: I'll make a note of that.
-[nectarine splats] -Just real quick, Hunter and Hoyt,
if you guys can't hear us right now,
translation.zh: ‎如果你们现在听不见我们说话

translation.en: it's because we're on this end digging into some fabulous...
translation.zh: ‎因为我们这边正在大吃超赞的

translation.en: -[thuds] -[Hoyt, muffled] It isn't an issue here. We're hearing you loud and clear.
translation.zh:
‎我们这边这个不是问题
‎听你们说话非常清楚
‎谢谢 霍伊特 亨特呢？

‎同样听得很清楚
‎我们自己也吃了一些 然后又是一些

translation.en: We've had ourselves [mumbling]. Just let us know
translation.zh:
‎同样听得很清楚
‎我们自己也吃了一些 然后又是一些 ‎如果我们吃油桃导致听不清
‎请告诉我们

‎如果我们吃油桃导致听不清
‎请告诉我们

translation.en: Okay, great, then we're all on the same page.
translation.zh: ‎好的 太好了 我们达成了共识

translation.en: Actually, Hunter, now might be a really good time
translation.zh:
‎实际上 亨特
‎现在应该是真正的好时机

translation.en: to get some developments of what's going on your end, so...
translation.zh: ‎谈谈你那边的进展 所以…
‎新加坡那边有什么新消息 兄弟？

translation.en: [Hunter] We've gone on really good meetings out here.
translation.zh: ‎我们这边开了几次很棒的会议

translation.en: I wouldn't say anything was closed, but I would say [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎我不会说任何事快成功了
‎但我要说

translation.en: [man] I think that's enough updates for the afternoon.
translation.zh: ‎我想今天下午的通气会到此为止

translation.en: I just wanna be the first to thank you all
-It was our pleasure! Our pleasure. -[group mumbles]
-Can we get y'all in here? -[Sonia] Here we go. Hit me, baby.
translation.zh: ‎大家都在吗？ ‎开始了 射我 宝贝

translation.en: I just don't think we can afford a trip this year.
translation.zh: ‎我就是觉得今年我们没有钱去旅行

translation.en: [scoffs] Babe. You know I need a vacation.
translation.zh: ‎哦 宝贝 你知道我需要放假

translation.en: Paula, look. Come over here. This is insane.
translation.zh:
‎宝拉 看 过来看看
‎这真是太疯狂了

translation.en: Yeah. So, okay, wait, wait, wait.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 所以 好的 等等

translation.en: What does the fine print say?
"Posted fees include tax and do not include additional bag charges.
translation.zh:
‎“刊登价格含税
‎不包括额外的行李费用

translation.en: Also, you may have to kiss your dad for six whole minutes?
translation.zh: ‎还有 你必须亲你爸爸整整六分钟

translation.en: You and your best friend have to get matching haircuts.
translation.zh:
‎你和你最好的朋友
‎必须剪成相配的发型

translation.en: Extended leg room offered at an additional charge.
translation.zh: ‎额外的腿部空间需要另付费

translation.en: You can only bring one carry-on bag and it must be a hamster.
translation.zh:
‎你只能带一个随身行李
‎而且必须是仓鼠

translation.en: No food is allowed on the flight unless you bring enough for everyone.
translation.zh:
‎禁止带食物上飞机
‎除非你为每个人带了足够的量

translation.en: Anyone who says the word "me" or "I" or "plane"
-[intercom chimes] -[woman] Thank you and we do hope you have a good flight.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 我们真的希望你的旅途愉快

translation.en: [sighs] I'm glad we're almost halfway there.
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴我们的航程快过半了

translation.en: I'm just gonna, like, grab a little shuteye.
-Oh, yeah. Do you, babe. -Yeah, baby. Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-好啊 宝贝 好的
‎-嗯 宝贝

translation.en: CEO and inventor of Air Cashew,
translation.zh: ‎凯秀航空的首席执行官和投资人

translation.en: the world's first airline owned by just me.
translation.zh: ‎我在世界上拥有的第一家航空公司

translation.en: I saved up enough money to buy my own airline.
translation.zh: ‎我攒够了钱 买下我自己的航空公司

translation.en: Beverage? We have hot soda and warm hair.
translation.zh: ‎要饮料吗？我们有热苏打水和暖头发

translation.en: We're committed to staying in the air once we've taken off.
translation.zh: ‎我们承诺一旦飞机起飞就留在空中

translation.en: -[trumpets blow] -And now, it's Pine Cone Time!
[Cashew] Our air is different -[air vents hiss] -from other airlines,
translation.zh: ‎我们航空公司和其他的不一样

translation.en: [sing-songy] but I won't tell you how.
translation.zh: ‎但我不会告诉你怎么不一样

translation.en: -[both] We're gonna die! -[Cashew] Gonna die. Your words, not mine.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要死了
‎-要死了 你说的 我没说

translation.en: truffle pig, hot scrod, goose dust,
translation.zh: ‎松露猪 热烤条 鹅粉

translation.en: -We're gonna die. -and the Spanish word for dream, sueño.
It took a big, hot sueño to sew this plane together.
translation.zh:
‎把这架飞机缝合在了一起
‎花费了巨大热忱的梦想

translation.en: all our planes are homemade and FDA-certified, nom nom.
translation.zh:
‎我们所有的飞机都是手工打造
‎获得美国食药监局认证 好吃

translation.en: I tried to buy my own sports team,
translation.zh: ‎我还尝试买下属于我的体育队

translation.en: but no one wanted to be called the Denver Doodles of Nashville.
translation.zh:
‎但没人想要被称作
‎纳什维尔的丹佛小粪渣队

translation.en: [playfully] So I turned my sights to the skies.
I can't believe this is happening.
translation.zh: ‎我真不敢相信正在发生的事

translation.en: or we'll have to wake up the pilot.
translation.zh: ‎否则我们必须叫醒飞行员了

translation.en: the only airline where you can earn...
translation.zh: ‎唯一可以赚取点数的航空公司
